abstract: House overwhelmingly passes a modest measure agreed upon by both Democrats and Republican to end a tax withholding program and lawmakers celebrate its passage, underscoring just how big small accomplishments are in a period of deep-seated partisan gridlock.
snippet: In voting to repeal a withholding requirement for contractors, the House overwhelmingly approved the first of the so-called jobs bills that Republicans and Democrats have agreed upon.
lead_paragraph: In voting to repeal a withholding requirement for contractors, the House overwhelmingly approved the first of the so-called jobs bills that Republicans and Democrats have agreed upon.

headline.main: In Small Burst of Bipartisanship, House Passes Two Pieces of Jobs Bill
headline.print_headline: In Small Burst of Bipartisanship, House Passes Two Pieces of Jobs Bill
